text: Franco Citti (23 April 1935 - 14 January 2016) was an Italian actor. He acted in over fifty movies between the early 1960s and the late 1990s. He was best known to non-Italian audiences as Cal√≤ in The Godfather (1972) and The Godfather Part III (1990). He also appeared in the movies Accattone (1961) and Oedipus Rex (1967). Citti was born in Fiumicino, Rome. His brother was the director and screenwriter Sergio Citti (1933-2005). Citti died on 14 January 2016 in Rome, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Rome Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors
title: Franco Citti
